name: Health Education and Renewable Energy

address: SS 1226 Sector H , Lda Colony , Kanpur Road ,

briefDescription: HERE is one of the newly born NGO initiatives by youths from different corporates who felt the need to development Indian society and create a different work by promoting Health , Education and promoting most significant and reliable product line of Renewable energy like Solar panels, Solar Lanterns , Solar water pump on DC, Solar street light LED, Solar charge controller and Solar DC fans. We benefited 30+ students in child education program,5 women by skill development and self employment and 20+ people with employment in different organization

address: SS 1226 Sector H , Lda Colony , Kanpur Road,
